I'm running in OS X on Steam with 0.24.2.559 and it's not working, I've placed the "ImprovedChaseCamera" in the folder "GameData." Is there anything I'm missing. This is the first and only mod I've installed so I'm sure there aren't any conflicts. I've tried it with my career save and a fresh sandbox to no avail. Is there a way I can see if its actually starting up with it? The load screen goes by so quickly.

Thanks!

Is there a way I can see if its actually starting up with it? The load screen goes by so quickly.

Open Console, on the left side of the window there is a menu that says 'files'. Scroll down the list and find the Unity drop down, under Unity there will be Player.log Aka Files>~/Library/Logs>Unity>Player.log. That will tell you if the plugin loaded.

Press V a few times.

The chase cam usually fails to work right when you load a vessel, you need to cycle between cameras back to Free if you want the Free chase mode.
Also, it doesn't do anything while in "Auto" mode, if that's what you were trying.
